org.corfudb.runtime.clients

Class BaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.clients.BaseClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient

    public class BaseClient
extends Object
implements IClient
    This is a base client which sends basic messages. It mainly sends PINGs, as well as the ACK/NACKs defined by the Corfu protocol. This is also responsible to send SET_EPOCH messages used to seal the servers with an epoch

    Created by mwei on 12/9/15.

    • Method Detail

      • pingSync

        public boolean pingSync()
        Ping the endpoint, synchronously.
        Returns:
        True, if the endpoint was reachable, false otherwise.

      • setRemoteEpoch

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> setRemoteEpoch(long newEpoch)
        Sets the epoch on client router and on the target layout server.
        Parameters:
        newEpoch - New Epoch to be set
        Returns:
        Completable future which returns true on successful epoch set.

      • getVersionInfo

        public CompletableFuture<VersionInfo> getVersionInfo()

      • ping

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> ping()
        Ping the endpoint, asynchronously.
        Returns:
        A completable future which will be completed with True if the endpoint is reachable, otherwise False or exceptional completion.

      • reset

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> reset()
        Reset the endpoint, asynchronously. WARNING: ALL EXISTING DATA ON THIS NODE WILL BE LOST.
        Returns:
        A completable future which will be completed with True if the endpoint acks, otherwise False or exceptional completion.

      • restart

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> restart()
        Restart the endpoint, asynchronously.
        Returns:
        A completable future which will be completed with True if the endpoint acks, otherwise False or exceptional completion.
